title: Star Guardian missions
body:
Honestly I'm just trying to get the ward out of this game mode so I was selectively doing missions.

"Hard - A Star's Ascent" Win Invasion: Onslaught win an A or higher. 

I recently completed this mission, I have the game in my match history, shows an A as the grade and everything but I did not receive the two tokens.

replies.body: It looks like the mission you played with Syndra where you got the A actually counted towards your progress for the mission 'A Star's Refinement'. You didn't have the mission 'Star's Ascent' yet which is why it didn't count for that one.
